Good Comments: Lots of errors.  Seems like they don't have an editor/QCer...
Speedy subs but lots of errors with typos and grammar.
Decent speed sub - getting better as the episodes progress (esp eps 7 and 8). If you want speed, go FLoser, if you want quality, go Simoun-Fans

Repetitive grammar/spelling mistakes that really kill some parts of the story, as well as obnoxious side notes that decreased my overall enjoyment of the series. Used emoticons in the subtitles in the emotional/important parts, thus ruining the mood. :/
Bad Comments: Tons of really obvious errors and mistranslations.
anyone with English as a first language should be able to tell the difference between tenses. simple mistakes that are easy to spot such as 'were' and 'are' 'a - at' etc

Too many spelling and grammatical mistakes… and obviously they don't even bother researching the kanji writing for the characters' names (or listening closely to the dialogues…), otherwise they would have gotten Micchi's last name right.
